mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "The Visual Side of S/D", "Outreach", "Quarterly Movement Report", "A Report to the Membership", "Meet the CTM", "A Frolic Up The Holler", "Variety", "Conservation", "1983 Premium Records", "Face Lift Time For Plus", "Modular Choreo", "41 + 52 = M/S" and "National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Style Lab", "Discovery", "Advanced Dancing", "Experimental Notes", "Contra Corner", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Round The World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "On The Record", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
